EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_T-Mobile Workshop_Q116.Confirmation - Factoria
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cloud Foundry Workshop in Factoria on March 25th.
Time: 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM Location: 12920 SE 38th St, Bellevue, WA 98006 NP5 1st Floor Training Room
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io]]>.
